actions.name: Harvest
actions.description:
Trigger: The user's equipped [Natural][Food] item is consumed.

Effect: The user rolls an Easy Natural World skill check and on a success recycles a copy of the consumed item and equips it. If Sunny Weather is active, this is a Trivial Natural World check instead.

actions.name: Harvest
actions.description: Passive: the creature gains [Berry Grower] if it did not already possess it.
